ddf.security.realm.sts

Class StsRealm

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    STSClientConfiguration, org.apache.shiro.authc.LogoutAware, org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManagerAware, org.apache.shiro.realm.Realm, org.apache.shiro.util.Initializable, org.apache.shiro.util.Nameable

    public class StsRealm
extends AbstractStsRealm
    The STS Realm is the main piece of the security framework responsible for exchanging a binary security token for a SAML assertion.
